description: This file defines a mock data module for a food delivery app, including sample data for restaurants, menu categories, and menu items, as well as utility functions to retrieve menu items for a specific restaurant and to lookup restaurants by ID.

methods.name: menuForRestaurant
methods.description: Returns a list of menu items associated with a specific restaurant ID, generating menu items with unique IDs based on the restaurant.

methods.name: restaurantById
methods.description: Retrieves a Restaurant object by its ID from the list of predefined restaurants.
